For the sake of readability, I would try to come up with something starting with either _"when"_ or "with"_ for the `context` hooks - it really helps understanding what's going on. Also: using "it" is a bit ambiguous here...

How about something like:
```ruby
context "when the user is a student on another team" do
  # do stuff
```

_(this also goes for the other contexts you define here)_
